title: News24.com | PODCAST | Covid-19 Chronicles: South Africans stranded abroad are locked down, locked out
description: Thousands of South Africans are trapped abroad, unable to return home due to the strict lockdown regulations in place to combat the spread of the novel coronavirus. Many feel abandoned by the South African government and are desperate for help.
content:
Thousands of South Africans are trapped abroad, unable to return home due to the strict lockdown regulations in place to combat the spread of the novel coronavirus.
They are running out of funds and options as each day passes.
Many feel abandoned by the Sou… [+851 chars]
